option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

task.summary: Default task
- (hope) I implemented the possibility to play a targetted card w. no effect if no possible targets available.
Fixed a parsing error (with playerTargetIndexInt)
Prince self-target works
Refactoring senderPlayerCharacter...
Starting working on fixing Countess-rule server and client site
Custom fill deck (to test countess rule) waitForDiscard-method loop for discard (legalPlay flag introduced)
Custom fill deck (to test countess rule) waitForDiscard-method loop for discard (legalPlay flag introduced)
ACTION_DENIED cases implemented; - illegal card index - Countess rule - Unvalid raget - Guard guess unvalid index
- Increased size of game windows... - Game win messages created - Fixed some LMS-bugs
- Increased size of game windows... - Game win messages created - Fixed some LMS-bugs
- Now clears actionHistory upon game-end and new round - Players have 30 s to 'pick up' game end tuple - Various other small fixes
- Started Public Key Crypto (proof of concept with username and lobbyname, however, many missing

- Players can now disconnect during games (rest will get to lobby list scene) - inLobby flag moved from Controller to Model - The winning player now starts the next round (int latestWinnerIndex added to Game.class)
- started on jUnit 4
- A bit of refactoring - Introduced a new ExecutorService for RequestThreads
- Fixed some merge fuck-ups
- Fixed some merge fuck-ups
- Slight rearrangengement and clean-up of code.

- Slight rearrangengement and clean-up of code. - Commenting of Gameplay (not done though) - Seperated joinServer into joinServerLogic and original method - Made first test for joinServerLogic - Added Ping-pong testing method - Added 'bloom' hover effect on cards

- Added tests (i.e. jUnit testin) to git - Renamed various variables - Seperated 'logic' from Controller to Model (NOT done) - Various jUnit-tests - Renamed connect to Lobby codes (i.e. from 0, 1, 2 to proper codes)
- Fixed double msg's in chat
- Changed a few ServerCiphers to LobbyCiphers
- Not enough players to start the game tuple-response
- Futher work on testing
- Added a HashMap of <UUID, Lobby> - Minor stuff
- Futher work on testing

- Renamed uniqueName to userID - Renamed leaderForCurrentLobby to isLeader - Added BG-image to GameScene - made flags in JavaFXClient/Model private - Started on a Lock for mutual exclusion, however, should likely be removed - Renamed Character to Role - Started working on a timeMeasurements-system ... - Merged Lobby.java with upstream
- Fixed case sensitive image names (images missing in .jar file) - Reformulated some text in the scenes - Renamed chr to r in Hand - Added extra pop-up in Server (should probably be removed)
- added image files
